# NSScroller.UsableParts.noScrollerParts

**Case**

Specifies that the scroller has neither a knob nor scroll buttons, only the knob slot.

## Declaration

```swift
case noScrollerParts
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.UsableParts.onlyScrollerArrows**: Specifies that the scroller has only scroll buttons, no knob.
- **NSScroller.UsableParts.allScrollerParts**: Specifies that the scroller has at least a knob, possibly also scroll buttons.

items.description: Specifies that the scroller has only scroll buttons, no knob.
